title: How to Prepare a New Yixing Teapot for Pu Erh Tea

steps.headline: Wash teapot with water, only.
steps.description: Never use soap or detergent. Put it to a big greaseless pot, cover the teapot with water and boil for 10 minutes. Remove the teapot and discard the water when it is cool enough to handle.

steps.headline: Add about 20g Pu-erh tea leaves to the big greaseless pot.
Add water to the pot and heat until lukewarm.
steps.description: Then put teapot (separate lid from the teapot) into the pot (make sure that the water covers the teapot).

steps.headline: Boil the teapot for about 30 minutes.
Wash teapot with boiling pure water.

text: Wash teapot with water, only. Never use soap or detergent. Put it to a big greaseless pot, cover the teapot with water and boil for 10 minutes. Remove the teapot and discard the water when it is cool enough to handle. Add about 20g Pu-erh tea leaves to the big greaseless pot.  Add water to the pot and heat until lukewarm. Then put teapot (separate lid from the teapot) into the pot (make sure that the water covers the teapot). Boil the teapot for about 30 minutes.  Wash teapot with boiling pure water.  Let teapot naturally cool down.
